# SCF - NET-07 - Remote Session Termination
Mechanisms exist to terminate remote sessions at the end of the session or after an organization-defined time period of inactivity. 
## Mapped framework controls
### NIST 800-53
- [SC-10](sc-10.md)
  
## Control questions
Does the organization terminate remote sessions at the end of the session or after an organization-defined time period of inactivity?
